participant_abstract.sent: In this first meeting we discussed project goals, aims, finances, and the things to get done befroe next meeting.
We also took some time to become acquainted with the team members and the tools that we will be using.
To finish off the meeting we did some preliminary brainstorming on what the main features of our product design should be, based on previous personal experience with television remote controls.
For the next meeting I am to focus on the working design of the project, while others tackle other issues.

participant_actions.sent: I will concentrate on working design, Iain on tech design.
